name: AEROCLUB BARCELONA-SABADELL
about: Aeroclub Barcelona-Sabadell, established in 1953, is the oldest and one of the largest aviation academies in Spain. Located at Sabadell Airport, just 20 kilometers from Barcelona, the school boasts a fleet of over 40 modern aircraft, including single-engine, multi-engine, helicopters, and gliders. With a team of 20 experienced instructors, Aeroclub Barcelona-Sabadell offers a wide range of EASA-certified courses, including ATPL Integrated and Modular, Private Pilot, Commercial Pilot, and Cabin Crew training. Known for its excellent pass rates, with over 90% of students passing exams on their first attempt, the school attracts students from around the world. Committed to safety and excellence, Aeroclub Barcelona-Sabadell is the ideal choice for aspiring aviators seeking top-quality training and a promising career in aviation. Join us to embark on a fulfilling journey to the skies.
services:
["Helicopter initiation course
Glider initiation course
Ultralight introductory course
Airplane Pilot Course
Helicopter Pilot Course"]
